snippet: He won the world title in November, but then skipped some of his favorite tournaments before coming back to win the Zurich Chess Challenge last week.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column describes stops made by world chess champion Magnus Carlsen during promotional tour before coming back to win the Zurich Chess Challenge.
lead_paragraph: He won the world title in November, but then skipped some of his favorite tournaments before coming back to win the Zurich Chess Challenge last week.

headline.main: Magnus Carlsen Picks Up Where He Left Off
headline.print_headline: World Champ Picks Up Where He Left Off
